DECLARE @sql0 NVARCHAR(max)=''
SELECT @sql0 += ' Drop table ' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.'+ QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) + '; '
FROM   INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE  Table_schema = 'Dimension' or Table_schema = 'Fact'
Exec Sp_executesql @sql0

DECLARE @sql nvarchar(max)
DECLARE @sql2 nvarchar(max)
SET @sql = 'drop schema if exists Dimension GO create schema Dimension'
SET @sql2 = 'drop schema if exists Fact GO create schema Fact'
EXEC sp_executesql @sql
EXEC sp_executesql @sql2

SELECT *
INTO Dimension.Suppliers
FROM Integration.Suppliers 


SELECT p.PurchaseSKey
	, p.[OrderDate]
	, p.SupplierSKey
	, p.[StockItemID]
	, p.[PurchaseOrderID]
	, p.[OrderedOuters]
	, p.[ReceivedOuters]
	, p.[PackageTypeID]
	, p.[IsOrderFinalized]
INTO Fact.Purchase
FROM Integration.Purchase p


SELECT t.TransSKey
	, t.[TransactionDate]
	, t.SupplierSKey
	, t.[TransactionTypeID]
	, t.[PaymentMethodID]
	, t.[SupplierTransactionID]
	, t.[PurchaseOrderID]
	, t.[SupplierInvoiceNumber]
	, t.[AmountExcludingTax]
	, t.[TaxAmount]
	, t.[TransactionAmount]
	, t.[OutstandingBalance]
	, t.[IsFinalized]
INTO Fact.Transactions
FROM Integration.Transactions t

SELECT * FROM Fact.Transactions
SELECT * FROM Dimension.Suppliers

SELECT table_schema, table_name
FROM information_schema.TABLES 
WHERE table_schema = 'Dimension' OR table_schema = 'Fact'
